description:
In a rural town in France, full of cosplayers. Within the town celebrating a pop cultural event is Goemon. Next to inn he decides to watch at is Chloé`s Bistro. Chloé is exactly the woman Goemon was looking for Lupin`s current target. A woman who inherited a treasure from a Belgian Millionaire, and is being targeted for her life. Though she had no luck and struggled with the lack of her Bistro`s success, Chloé was a beautiful lady. Goemon starts to think more about Chloé as a person...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Extravagance of Goemon Ishikawa XIII
十三代目石川五ェ門散財ス
